dependencies.@js-temporal/polyfill: Remove this dependency once all supported Node.js versions have adopted TC39
dependencies.env-paths: Replace the <=2.x restriction with the latest stable version once Jest offers stable support for ESM; see also: https://jestjs.io/docs/ecmascript-modules

devDependencies.@types/node: Keep the upper bound in sync with the lower bound specified in `engines`
devDependencies.@yarnpkg/sdks: Replace the <=2.x || ^3.0.0 restriction with the latest stable version once a stable 3.x release appears

scripts.clean: yarn run -B del dist lib types
scripts.repatch: git add -- package.json && yarn patch-commit -s "$1" && git checkout -- package.json && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-all: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn upgrade-packages' && false
scripts.upgrade-packages: yarn up '**' '@types/node@<=16.x' '@yarnpkg/sdks@<=2.x || ^3.0.0' && yarn up -R '**' && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-yarn-itself: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn clean-install' && false
